The staff are very helpful , friendly and seem happy to be there unlike the Hilton LAX where the staff seem not to be happy to be there and it shows in their lack of service with a smile. This trip the hotel had made a booking error and had charged us for it. On addressing it with the manager he immediately set things right. They have gained our loyalty.

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada, great service”
Reviews.Author: PedroARivera2
Reviews.Content: I must first begin by thanking Estela for going above and beyond expectations. Her warm smile and friendly attitiude were a welcome sight for a business traveler. Her attention to detail, presentation and the needs of her guest were evident throughout the day. She was truly a pleasure to have met. I would recommend this hotel and it's business services based on this very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Don't book the standard room”
Reviews.Author: NgaHauEwha
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times in the past and have always booked a club room. This time, i only needed the room for a 7 hour layover so I booked the lowest level room and boy do I regret it. Just paying an extra $20 may have given us access to a better stay. Our room had stains on the carpet, stains on the upholstered furniture and the bed - although it had clean linen - the mattress underneath was wet! We were desperate to catch up with sleep after a 12 hour flight with another 6 hour flight looming we really would have appreciated a room which did not look as though a wild cat had been let loose in it. You do get what you pay for so pay a bit more if you want to rest in relative comfort.

Reviews.Title: “Location great if you are on a stopover”
Reviews.Author: auzzigirls
Reviews.Content: We had one night back in LA before flying home so we booked in thinking we wouldn't have a car and it would be easy to get to airport, which it is, but we had a hire car - which we hired through arguscarhire.com.au (and we got a great deal through them - yes I would recommend them) and our reasonably priced accomodation jumped in price dramatically as we had to pay for valet parking (AU$28) per night and we were advised that they did not have self parking, so think carefully before booking as we also had a no refund, no cancellation policy on our booking, (which we booked a month in advance). The hotel is nice and rooms are large and clean. And check your bill as they tried to overcharge us for 2 nights on the valet parking. Off course they apologised and removed the overcharge!

Reviews.Title: “Is this a real Sheraton???”
Reviews.Author: AysenurErdem
Reviews.Content: They charge 30$ for valet parking :) The dark skinned guy at the parking (Ithink he is a manager or smth like that) is very rude. While we were making our check we asked the price of valet parking per day. He told us it is 30$. After the check in we should take our car for self parkig, he told us that it costs 20 usd for 10 minute parking there after our long trip to LA from Turkey :) The woman at the reception was very polite I think she is from Romania. The breakfast was disgusting. The Mexican mam at the restaurant was so rude also. Every morning we had to wait just for our tea for 10 minutes. She acted as if she is not a waitress :) We were very disapointed about this hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Best Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: tth627
Reviews.Content: As soon as we walked in the door Yolanda greeted us and made us feel welcomed. As well as Diane Cheeks Thank you sooo much for great service

Reviews.Title: “Received amazing service from Diane Cheek”
Reviews.Author: 24atlanta
Reviews.Content: Diane Cheek at Sheraton Gateway in Los Angeles, went above and beyond to provide us with exceptional customer service. We will continue to use this hotel again and again! Thank you Diane! - [---]

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: A O
Reviews.Content: We do live events at various hotels around LAX almost monthly, and the Sheraton Gateway is not my favorite hotel around LAX to work at, the valets and the front desk are not as helpful as I would like, but Estela Estrada singlehandedly makes it one of my favorites. She should be the director of guest relations, if the rest of the staff had the passion for service that Estela has, then this would without a doubt be the best hotel ever! Azra & Shoni in the catering office are also exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!!DIANE PAUL VERLINA YALONDA ARLENE AND CHRISTA”
Reviews.Author: ElondaW
Reviews.Content: I have NEVER experienced this type of customer service before! From the very moment I pulled into the parking lot until the very moment I left. The valet attendants were very attentive and prompt with great customer service. The front desk greeted me a smile from the moment I stepped into the door. If I had to think of one thing that was not to my liking, I would not be able to do so. My visit to LA was due to the passing of one of my family members. With such short notice, I used Starwoords Preferred Guest reward points to book my room. When my points ran out, I relocated to the Radisson next door……BIG mistake. After being spoiled by the Sheraton, there was no comparison. I quickly changed back to the Sheraton...the very next day! With the great customer service and great accommodations, who could ask for more, right? Well, to my very pleasant surprise, the staff at the hotel wrote a handwritten note expressing their condolences in which all of them signed. The fact that a hotel would be so kind as to do such a thing solidified the fact that not matter where I go, I will always stay at the Sheraton. Thanks for a job well done!!!!! I would like to show special recognition to the following employees: DIANE!!!!!! You are the best Paul Verlina Arlene Christa Yalonda Sorry if I misspelled any of the names.

Reviews.Title: “Service isn't so good nowadays”
Reviews.Author: Mcannie
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here a few times before & it was great. This time, the hotel facilities were just as nice but where was the service & the friendly staff? They weren't around this time! Sad, it made us try another hotel on the way home instead of returning to this one.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at a decent price”
Reviews.Author: misatok579
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with our 3 children and definitely enjoyed it. We loved the room service so much, we ordered it for lunch and dinner - plenty of food for the 5 of us! I absolutely LOVED their beds - so soft and comfy that I wanted to take it home with me! The tv was awesome and my kids were glued to all of the channels offered for kids and family, plus we had a bit of room for them to run around. I would definitely stay here again as the hotel was a decent price and we truly enjoyed staying here and even sleeping here after flying 16 hrs from Australia :) Great job Sheraton!

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Gateway Los Angeles Meeting Accomodations & Associates Rocked My World.”
Reviews.Author: John T
Reviews.Content: I am compelled to provide recognition to Estela Estrada and the Staff of the Sheraton Gateway Los Angeles who went the extra mile to ensure attendees of the California Institute of Mental Health / Los Angeles County Department of Mental Health ICSC Harvest Meeting were well cared for and comfortable. Ms. Estrada was friendly, attentive (not intrusive) and is an excellent ambassador for Sheraton.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Estela Estrada in Banquets”
Reviews.Author: Gayle H
Reviews.Content: Estela Estrada took amazing care of me and my team. She is the most accommodating server I have come across. She is so friendly and kind. She exemplifies what a server should be. I am looking forward to having her service our event at the end of the month. We will be requesting her. Thank you Estela!

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Miguel M
Reviews.Content: I was there for a gala and found the service to be great - especially hotel worker, Estela Estrada. She was very helpful and despite all the chaos she always had a smile on her face. Thanks for making an ejoyable moment even better

Reviews.Title: “Excellent attention by MS. Estrada in customer service!”
Reviews.Author: Keith S
Reviews.Content: During a weekend seminar 9/8-9/9.11 in the San Clemente room, Estella Estrada was responsive, friendly & attentive as she performed her duties. We travel world-wide with Les Brown Enterprises and encounter hotel service employees everywhere, but Ms. Estrada has raised the bar for customer service. We definitely recommend her for ANY position dealing with and/or supporting the public. Thanks Sheraton Gateway for hiring people of Ms. Estrada's caliber! The food in Brassiere is EXCELLENT as well....we will return to book more seminars.

Reviews.Title: “i love hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Marksppt
Reviews.Content: hotel has very great service. i will stay here every time i come to Los Angeles. employees are are very nice and helpful. Especially Estera Estrede. she took very well care of us. Theres many hotels in this area but the The Sheraton gate way by lax is my 1st choice. Thanks Again to Estera Estrede she was the BEST!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Service, definately coming back.”
Reviews.Author: Maria L
Reviews.Content: Excellent service employes are respectful and courteous customer service is exeptional great for business meetings

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada of banquet department”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie M
Reviews.Content: Estela Estrada in Banquet department is taking such great care of me and my team. She is extremely polite and helpful. She is a delight to work with and we will request her to work our functions when we return here later this month.

Reviews.Title: “Staff was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: DolceVita2007
Reviews.Content: Besides being very conveniently located and having great sleeping rooms with plenty of space and amenities, the staff here was first rate. Throughout the day, we were constantly checked on by the banquet and a.v. staff to make sure our needs were not only being met, but exceeded. We had a wonderful experience with Estela Estrada who helped us organize a reception for our attendees. She was personable and flexible. Exactly what you need when hosting an event for 100+ people. Estela is a big reason we would bring our business back to the Sheraton Gateway. She was one of many stand-out staff members. Also, Zee Bell and Tanya Cornejo were fantastic in the sales and catering department. Every request we had was met with a "can do" attitude. And despite numerous changes and requests we threw their way, they made sure every detail came out just as planned. I've been in the professional event business for over 20 years and this hotel has really impressed me. If you have an event to hold, whether it be for business or pleasure, the Sheraton Gateway is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: “totally loved it”
Reviews.Author: stlandmexico
Reviews.Content: The room was great - bed was so comfy. The staff was helpful and wonderful (especially Diane and Alfredo). I would stay here in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Franj51
Reviews.Content: Also got to deal with Diane during a difficult situation. Was very pleasant, professional and most helpful. Entire desk and management team were great. Will certainly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Everytay will be here!”
Reviews.Author: FreddieRay
Reviews.Content: Everything was awesome! Starting with guest services, dining, location, etc! Diane Cheeks really made me feel so comfortable and "right at home!" Thanks a lot.... The room was spacious and the hotel is full of convienences.... Wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “Good location for touring Hollywood, Disney and Beverley Hills, etc”
Reviews.Author: sophielaura
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights at the end of our West Coast road trip. Hotel is well located, if you have a car, for Hollywood, Disney, etc, and better than paying top $ elsewhere. The staff ,especially the concierge, were spot on and eager to help. Rooms were fine, with great beds. Ate in the bar area, which was priced OK, and met our needs at the end of a long day touring around. Ate out a couple of nights, which is where the car comes in, as you need to travel 7-10 miles. Pool was clean and well kept, with a good fitness centre/health club. Happy to recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Assistance”
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo B
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel on numerous occassions in the past but I must say that none has been as delightful as this one, thanks to the kind assistance of Diane Cheek. Her witty personna brightened up the gloomiest day I have had in a long time. Not only was her attitude very pleasurable but her assistance with personal issues I was having has turned this trip into a real Labor Day weekend for me and my daughter. Thanks to her I will make sure that the next time I come to stay at this hotel I will leave my worries at home and to expect nothing but the best from the hotel staff,. THANKYOU Diane Cheek

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location to visit LA”
Reviews.Author: HelenaGuerra
Reviews.Content: Our room was spacious and tasteful decorated. I loved the details as a huge mirror hanged in the wall! We also had Starbucks coffee in our room. Everything was very clean. This location is a little busy and noisy but I had no complains, I slept well. The only issue was the ventilation from the bathroom of the room next to ours that was connected with our bathroom... No coments! 4 stars because it's a great value!

Reviews.Title: “Great, clean hotel at LAX”
Reviews.Author: traveller5678072
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night in May after driving back from Yosemite. We had an early flight the next morning. The hotel was clean. We ordered dinner to our room as there were no restaurants open at the hotel. The food was great but we would have rather ate in a restaurant. They have very limited hours at the hotel restaurants. The Starbucks also does not open until 5:30am even though by 5am there are about 30-40 people already up and waiting for the shuttle bus as many flights to the east coast leave before 7am. The hotel had a business atmosphere and I did see a large and crowded bar near the lobby. My wife and I had our 18 month old son with us and he slept on an inflatable toddler bed which fit in the large hotel room (one king size bed). In the morning the airport shuttles came regularly as we saw two come and go while waiting in the lobby for my wife to come down from the room. The shuttles were fairly packed which works out well because if the shuttle is not full it stops at other hotels - if it is full it goes straight to the airport terminals and this makes the trip much faster. Also, you can hear and see planes approaching for landing from the hotel room but this did not bother our sleep and our son loved watching them!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, did not disappoint”
Reviews.Author: Foxpup82
Reviews.Content: I decided to try the Sheraton Gateway because of all the good reviews it got on this site, and I'm pleased to report that it did not disappoint. Check in was quick and pleasant. Due to a stroke of luck, I was given a room on the exclusive 15th floor, and received free wireless Internet as a result. The room was spotless, with nice new furniture and crisp cotton bedding. even the rivet cover was cotton,a touch I really appreciate. The bathroom was also very clean. My only criticism of the room was the bathrOom however- very minor points, but as you know if you've read my other reviews, I have high standards. There were three small area of grout by the tub that were discolored. small thing I know, but. I feel the grout should be perfect! For some reason, the tissues in the holder on the counter were all very damp. It was a liitle strange, but I can see why housekeeping would have missed this one, as they looked perfectly dry. the hairdryer was in a strange location, resting on a metal bar by the toilet. I suppose they didn't want to clutter up the counter with it, but it just seemed not very well thought out. like I said, these are very minor things. I overall was very impressed with this hotel, and the very nice staff. I also noticed the sparkling pool was very well looked after, as every time a leaf drifted into the water, a staff member would come running with a net to scoop it out. Impressive! One more thing - despite the thick windows, you will hear some plane noise, as the airport is literally across the street. No big deal - I just used my earplugs til the flight schedule wound down. I would stay here again- this place is tied with the Mariott and the La Quinta down the street in my opinion. It's great to find a hotel that gets it right, to add to my list of dependable places to stay out by the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay close to LAX”
Reviews.Author: TLTraveller
Reviews.Content: Originally chose the hotel for it had a Starbucks located in the hotel. As well, located a stone throw from LAX. Free shuttle to and from the airport or self parking across the street, or you could valet it. It was also less than 1/2 hr SUNDAY afternoon drive to the Hollywood area. From checking in, staff was very helpful and courteous with my questions they have probably have answered 100X already that day, from checkout times to free WiFi to places to eat. Rooms were clean and very large. I had a nice view of the landing area of the airport so it was kind of cool to see planes take off and land. And the view of the parking lot was also nice if you like that sort of thing. If you are a light sleeper then the roar of the planes might unsettle you or the boom of the hotel doors from people going in & out of their rooms. The hotel had a nice pool to cool down from the California sun. A standard hotel bar and an Italian restaurant. No in room safe, but available ones at reception. My tv remote went on fritz (I think the batteries were dieing), but with WiFi it didn't matter to me. Not to be alarmed, but to connect to the in room WiFi, they charge it to your room, but the charges are reversed in the system automatically. Overall, it was a great lay over stop and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice property, convenient to airport”
Reviews.Author: wacomick
Reviews.Content: Clean full service hotel minutes from airport. Helpful, friendly staff. Only complaint is the charge for wifi in room when the business area offers it for free. Still highly recommended hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but basic accommodation - great staff who are very helpful”
Reviews.Author: Louisa24
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one week as I was attending a conference at the hotel and thought it would be convenient to just pick the one hotel rather than check into a couple - especially after such a long flight from England. The rooms are quite spacious and the cleanliness is to a very high standard - the cleaning staff work very hard! The first room I was given was looking at the runway so I moved rooms and was given one overlooking the pool which was a much better view. They have a policy of rewarding you with $5 per night if you forego the maid service - I only received 3 vouchers in total even though I left the ticket on my door every night and the queue in the morning at the check in desk was always so long I couldn't be bothered to wait and get my voucher. The main thing I would have liked in my room would have been a mini fridge to store my own drinks. The internet was $12.95 for the night - very pricy!! Albert in the concierge was so helpful and friendly - that guy knows everything about LA and the places to check out and nothing is too much trouble. The staff on the check in desk were a little frosty and stiff but very professional and polite. The Starbucks and lobby area makes the hotel feel a bit more luxurious than it actually is, however the pool is always a bonus - there is also a spa jacuzzi but its always busy. If you want a hotel right near the airport to use as a base to explore the rest of the city or for business then this place is fine but if you're looking for something special and romantic then personally I would choose something well away from the airport and near the vast amount of beaches that are a 20-30 min drive away.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: trej78
Reviews.Content: I had a great experience at this hotel! From the start, we arrived a few hours early and Sheraton Gateway was able to accommodate early check-in for us witlhout any delay. The concierge service was exceptional as well. As far as Guest Services is concerned, everyone was great! Two individuals stand out to me in particular. One is a lady named Diane who made sure we received our requests in a timely manner. Another is a lady named Merlie(?) who went above and beyond to assist me with a special request. She even came out and met me at the front desk to assist me. Everyone I dealt with during this visit displayed the highest level of customer service and I would highly recomnmend this hotel to anyone visiting the Los Angeles area.

Reviews.Title: “Diane was great, made my stay”
Reviews.Author: travelingirl211
Reviews.Content: I wasn't planning to be in LA one more night but airline oversold for holiday weekend and I ended up unexpectedly with no suitcase at this Sheraton. Every one was very nice and helped me get settled in, especially Diane, she made sure I had everything I needed. THANKS to all the staff there, they made a differrence in my holiday weekend and LA isn't such a bad place to be stuck afterall.

Reviews.Title: “If you have to be stranded during a hurricane on the east coast, this is the place to strand.”
Reviews.Author: Nelamarie
Reviews.Content: 1st, I'm going to list the amazing people who turned what could have been hell into a nice SoCal extended weekend. Front desk, Paul piña, guest services Dianne cheek and marly Pickett. Bartenders/waiters @ Paparrzzi, Joe Stiteler & Mario, gift shop clerk Adrine. Every single person was amazing. I know I don't have all your names, but all of you combined are the definition of hospitality. Thank you all for turning what could have been a horrible experience into an 'unexpected extended weekend' Best wishes, Nela

Reviews.Title: “We loved how our event turned out!”
Reviews.Author: CL102011
Reviews.Content: We recently had my daughters Sweet Fifteen Celebration and we are so happy and satisfied with the service that was provided for us. Starting from the custumer service at the time fo arranging the event, and the food, the room decor, the servers and Alfonso, the banquet department ,our whole experience was exquisite and we are overall very satified with the service we received.

Reviews.Title: “Who cares if the bathroom needs a bit of updating!”
Reviews.Author: LErbb
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights here, got great deal on Priceline, the room was classy, bathroom needs some updating but I was expecting that from previous reviews. Free computers Wifi in Lobby, no problem. Very nice pool area. Walk out the front door and go right and there is a Subway shop and parking for $14, could see our car from our room above pool area. Concierge was super helpful and check was the friendliest and fastest I've seen in a longtime. Ate in the lobby lounge very good! I was wondering about all the reviews I'd read previously from 1st time posters who raved about how nice particular staff members were, but I feel they really that nice at this hotel - genuinely helpful and friendly almost across the board!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Server - Estela Estrada”
Reviews.Author: Kay W
Reviews.Content: While at the Democratic Reception & Dinner this past weekend, I noticed the beautiful decorations as well as the great service! I asked our server what her name was and she said Estela Estrada because she was so attentive to our needs and she cleared the table in a prompt manner which showed me that she was putting forward the effort to meet our needs. In all the Hotels I've visited, I never received such attentive service. I look forward to visiting the Sheraton for future business seminars and I will definately look for Estela to serve me. Thank you Estela Estrada - You are the Best!

Reviews.Title: “Sweet smiles of Estela Estrada”
Reviews.Author: Wade R
Reviews.Content: I love staying at the Sheraton Gateway whenever I am in LA. I especially like the warm smiles and exceptional service of the beautiful Estela Estrada. She always makes me feel welcome and cared for. The entire staff at Gateway is ready to serve at any hour.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a layover”
Reviews.Author: Thedriftingcanuck
Reviews.Content: We had a stopover through LAX and used the Sheraton Gateway to freshen up and get a bit of a rest. We walked from the terminals to the hotel (10 mins) and used the free shuttle to return to the terminals at night. The room was clean, the bed was comfy, the AC worked and the it was surprisingly quiet considering the location. Staff were helpful. Would recommend to friends and family looking for a stopover hotel while transiting through LAX.

Reviews.Title: “In Serious need of Sound Proofing”
Reviews.Author: htuteja
Reviews.Content: We could hear noise from attached rooms and the corridor, so definitely not a quite hotel. It was quite disturbing. Also, I was misled about the parking charges by saying self park is $13.2. Self park was actually in a private parking located behind the hotel, so you had to search for a parking there, pay and then walk to the hotel. Walk is not long but finding a parking in that private park is not easy....so I ended up paying $28 for parking per day, which was not planned and blows up the overall cost of stay. Now I can see amount charged to my credit card is $30 more than the total bill I was shown at departure, so I guess, I have to go through the hassle of clarifying that... Food in the hotel was good, but room service had two charges, one for delivery and one for service, not sure whats the difference and nobody could explain that. Overall, I will not recommend it

Reviews.Title: “SHERATON GATEWAY - DIANNE HELPED US”
Reviews.Author: Silke N
Reviews.Content: We just checked in at the Sheraton gateway LA airport. The hotel was a welcomed change from the other one the airline put us up in due to Hurricane delays in NY. The check in was good and Dianne really helped us once we got to our room by pointing things out to us and making our stay better than we had anticipated. Thanks Dianne

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada is the best!!”
Reviews.Author: pinkyy D
Reviews.Content: Estela was the best when I was at the Sheraton last week! She made sure we had everything and she would have everything organized! She welcomes you with a warm smile and makes you fee like if you never left home. She kept asking me if I needed anything else but what really surprised me was when it was our break, she had a big line that wanted to buy things and she finished a line like maximum 30 people in less than 10 mins! She was so quick I was astonished! The Sheraton should be grateful to have someone like her. Thanks Sheraton and Estela for everything especially your undivided attention to all of us! Thanks Estela! You are the best and I will definitely recommend my friends and family to come to the Sheraton and ask for Estela!!! She is the best! The Sheraton should have more people like her that can move with ease! She should have a raise! ;D

Reviews.Title: “Just Say No”
Reviews.Author: GlennLittle
Reviews.Content: I returned to Los Angles, California for my 40th high school reunion which was held at the hotel. The hotel is located within visual distance of LAX and there was a free shuttle that ran often between LAX and the hotel. The checkin was quick and polite and I was in my room in minutes. The room was spacious and clean. I had two issues that spoiled the hotel experience: poor maintenance of the room and the continuing attempt by hotels to "unbundle" expenses and change for minor services. The concept of "unbundling" is that the consumer is willing to pay for "extra" services. This might be the case with room service or personal service, but has morphed into a hotel holding it's hand out constantly for services and products that are excessive in relation to the direct costs to hotel. As to poor maintenance one would have to just look at the bathroom. The bathtub failed the mold test where mold had been covered with more caulk. This failure extended to paint on the rusted door hinges and the light fixture in the living area that just fell out of the ceiling. Finally, when the shower curtain was installed the tile was cracked and remain not repaired In regard to the petty unbundled expenses I would just point to the bottles of water on the desk with a sign about their neck with "Got Thirst?" in large letters and in much smaller letters the pricing of $3.00. Oh please-it is a bottle of no name water at room temperature. The little sign might have said $200 for the room - "Got $3 more bucks?" In the same line of abuse was the demand for $12.50 per day to receive WIFI service- clearly an odd pricing model considering the relative cost to the hotel. Lastly I should comment as to the Valet parking scheme where for $28 one can park for 24 hours, but not be assured that a place will be reserved if you leave during the day. There are a limited number of spaces and I watched 2 drivers and a supervisor move cars on an evening only to question the true profitability of valet parking, Considering all of these factors I think that one should find somewhere else to stay when in this area. I have to believe that one can do better for a similar pricing with better maintenance and less petty expenses.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks Diane.”
Reviews.Author: shrinkrap_10
Reviews.Content: You rock! Thanks for your help.Had a great stay, and plan to return here when I visit my son in college.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it and I will definitely be back!”
Reviews.Author: lauriew700
Reviews.Content: I visited your hotel recently for a training seminar that you hosted from August 20-22. All of your staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, but one person, Estela Estrada, far shined above the rest. She was extremely pleasant, friendly and asked if I needed anything and attended to ALL of my needs. I wanted you to know this because I hope you realize what a great person and employee you have in Estela, and I hope you show her how much you value her by compensating her accordingly. In these days and times it is hard to find employees who are loyal and strive to do their very best every day to make your hotel among the best accommodations in the Los Angeles area.

Reviews.Title: “I had a nice telaxing nigh!!!”
Reviews.Author: bossladyy
Reviews.Content: Diane cheek was. A wonderful helpful advisor ...she made our stay easy and relaxing .... thanks Sheraton Gateway /Diane cheek

Reviews.Title: “Love it!!! Will definitely be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: LeLe007R
Reviews.Content: Staying here is wonderful, from check-in with Ms. Arleen Smith who is professional, efficient & fast, to Diane Cheeks in guest services who is absolutely wonderful & very accommodating. I have stayed here on numerous occasions & have always dealt with her. She is polite, professional & always gets me what I need. Keep up the good job Ladies!!

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed!”
Reviews.Author: Harris777
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for convenience sake. The seminar I was attending was being held there so that's a no brainer. I was very impressed with this hotel and it's staff. Front desk staff during check in @ 11:30pm-great. Wait staff during breakfast in the restaurant Brasserie 7:45am-excellent. Very clean hotel. Even the bathrooms (in various locations on the first floor) were clean and smelled nice!!!! The hotel is across the street from the airport. I was on the 14th floor(1402) at the end of the hallway. There is a big picture window at the end of that hall and you can see planes taking off from that view. Way cool !!! I only had breakfast in the hotel (the buffet). It was $19.95. Pricey, but not bad. I intended to eat my monies worth. The fresh fruit was delicious. Sweet. My only issue was the room was not throughly cleaned. I'm a woman and I check for these things, but that was taken care of. Really nothing to make a stink over, but enough to give a 9 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: “Classy Property With Extremely Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Parker J
Reviews.Content: The hotel lobby is modern and tastefully decorated. Staff were cleaning diligently which is why the place looks immaculate. I was having a problem logging onto the internet in my room but Dianne Cheek was so kind and patient in helping me get online. My stay was a wonderful experience and one I would gladly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Service”
Reviews.Author: Cosmas M
Reviews.Content: This is to mention the service given at Havelock City conference was excellent. The place was clean and the tables well laid out. I must specially commend the One woman waitress who attended was extremely courteous and went well out of her way to help every one with a smile. It went out till late but she and the bar tender was very good. Keep it up, Cosmas Mahagama

Reviews.Title: “We were treated like Gold Card Members and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: sjames100
Reviews.Content: The stay was awesome! We were treated like Gold Card Members and we're not! The staff was absolutely wonderful. We were there for a conference of over 700 people that descended on the hotel for 2 day weekend. It was clean and comfortable throughout the hotel and rooms. Our flight was delayed coming in and meant we were there after normal check in - called the hotel and they made sure our reservation was held. Also had a late flight leaving out, but checkout was before the conference was over, they put our bags in storage and i was able to sit comfortably the rest of the afternoon in the lobby area and wait for my trip to lax for a red eye flight.

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada”
Reviews.Author: bdeblanc
Reviews.Content: Ms. Estrada provided exceptional service for our business group happy hour on 8/19/11. She made our visit better than we had hoped.

Reviews.Title: “Ohhh so awesome!”
Reviews.Author: TS25_11
Reviews.Content: This was such a great place to be...and the customer service was exceptional. I had a cashier when I was buying my lunch who was just so nice to me and everyone else around I made sure I got her name...it was Estela Estrada. Next time you visit, look for her because she was very helpful in meeting my needs. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent personal touch”
Reviews.Author: tim n
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the level of service by one of the hotel operators, Diane Cheeks, who addressed us by name and personally went our of her way to accommodate our needs. The service was way beyond my expectation as a business traveler. Will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Estele Estrada was very helpful!”
Reviews.Author: Rich S
Reviews.Content: The server at our conference during lunch brought me a high carb. meal that I couldn't eat since I'm diabetic. I had requested the low carb meal but it didn't seem that it was understood by the staff. As soon as I told Estele, she said she'd take care of it. She ordered it and gave me updates and personally delivered it to me! This was critical because I was one of the presenters for the event and needed to get back before the seminar started again to set up the afternoon. Thanks Estele!

Reviews.Title: “A nice, rather large place near LAX”
Reviews.Author: LarTraveler
Reviews.Content: This is one of the larger, and busier LAX hotels. It is full of traveling families, business people and flight crews. Has Valet parking, self park is at a close public lot at half the cost. Nice in house restaurant with a nice daily brunch and menu items. A Club Lounge room was not available for me and my daughter, so we were upgraded to a Kind Suite. Nice large room...but no small refrigerator, which families appreciate. Helpful staff...but very busy. Probably good for staying for an early next day flight, or late arrival before driving.

Reviews.Title: “Love Diane”
Reviews.Author: INDYLOVE
Reviews.Content: So far service has been fantastic... Thank you to the gentleman that got me the fridge and bible so quickly and thanks to Diane for her customer service and cool humming... Lol

Reviews.Title: “excellent customer service”
Reviews.Author: adamsa1964
Reviews.Content: All the staff very courteous and helpfull, especially Diane at the front desk . she went out of her way to make sure that we enjoyed our stay. Everyone was wonderful. Truley a treat,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service from Associate Estela Estrada”
Reviews.Author: Sandra C
Reviews.Content: While visiting the Sheraton Hotel for a business seminar, Estela Estrada provided excellent customer service. After the seminar, I was looking for the Starbucks to get a cup of coffee for the road. I sought assistance from Estela Estrada. She pointed me in the direction of the Starbucks but informed me that they were closed for the day. She accommodated me by getting me a cup of Starbucks coffee for the road and I am truly thankful because I had a long drive home and I did not want to make any other stops on the road before returning home. THANKS ESTELA ESTRADA-Great Job! Sandra Crockett

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money, excellent view of airport”
Reviews.Author: Eddie A
Reviews.Content: For those people (like me), who love plane spotting, the place is perfect. Every 1 min there is a takeoff or landing aircraft in front of your room's window !! The hotel was very clean and the room confortable, very nice breakfast included in room's reservation, free wifi only at lobby and free vallet parking. The location was perfect for us, having a rent car, as it was close to reantal returns and easy to go to the airport. Quiet, clean and friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Missy L
Reviews.Content: We loved our business trip. Everybody was so kind and thoughtful especially Diane Cheeks!

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: glenn g
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sheraton in May, 2011. I got great servicve in particular from the one gift shop employee who said she was from Russia. I am a US citizen but have lived in Japan for 12 years and she could relate to me. What a reief. She worked the register of the gift shop of the Sheraton Gateway lobby. She went above and beyond her job description. She told me the cheapest, fastest, most interesting and convenient ways to tarvel to Malibu, Santa Monica and dowtown LA. She gave me the bus routes, names and numbers. She sxplained directions. She gave me other information about restaraunts, shopping, etc. Thanks to her I had a great time in CA. This information from the gift shop was invaluable for a person unfamilair to CA. It is too bad I forgot her name other wise I would I would have included it in this review. I took her advise and it was well worth it. I recieved great service from the housekeepers and pretty good service from other staff but far less than pleasant service from most of the hotel consiliars.. I came back and stayed again in August and got great service again. Another person in particular served me in ther lobby. She countlessly asked me if I needed anything while I surfed the internet on the sofa of ther hotel lobby. She did so with a warm friendly smile but not too much to be annoying. She made my stay very pleasant and knew how to take care of her customers. So as not to make the same mistake of forgeting the gift shop woman's name I got the name from the woman in the lobby. Her name is Estela Estrada, associate of the Sheraton Gateway hotel, LA. Maybe later I will add the gift shop person's name to another review.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy repeat visitor to the Sheraton Gateway LA”
Reviews.Author: MousseMakesGumbo
Reviews.Content: When I visit LA on my frequent biz travel to the South Bay I always stay at the Sheraton Gateway LA. The team from the the valet parking attendants, to the front desk, and the restaurant staff really "get "customer service. The hotel is clean and very safe. Hotels near airports can be very unpredictable. The Sheraton Gateway LA delivers 100% satisfaction during all my stays.

Reviews.Title: “awesome service”
Reviews.Author: blahLa
Reviews.Content: we had great food service, estela estrada was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DMBailey
Reviews.Content: We had the best stay at the Sheraton Gateway! The staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. Diane Cheek in customer service was determined to make sure our stay was perfect! Thank you Diane!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay near the airport.... Merly is really a great asset to this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: bootyman1
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay near airport. Had a minor problem but Merly took care of it immediately and was extremely helpfyl while doing so. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hotel in LAX Vicinity”
Reviews.Author: euro2006
Reviews.Content: I spent a night at this property during the fourth of July getaway. Nothing fancy but functional. Quick check-in and quick check-out. The airport shuttle stop is right in front of the hotel, very convenient. Give yourself some extra time for waiting and the shuttle bus made several stops before heading to LAX. If you're in a rush, better take a cab. Mediocre buffet breakfast, I should have opted for Starbucks located right inside the hotel. It's an old hotel. I think they had some work done with new fancy looking carpets. The bathroom looks dated but functioning. No in-room fridge and safe deposit box. Free wifi access at the lobby. You can use the computers and printers at the lobby to print out your boarding passes for free too. Stay away from the room with connecting doors, you can hear the noise loud and clear. I rang them and they did switch me without any questions. Anyway it's a fine hotel considering the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: “Another comfortable stay.”
Reviews.Author: Ellemay
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel numerous times & every time we have enjoyed a comfortable & restful stay. Check in- All went accordingly to plan with no hiccups. The Staff were attentive & friendly. Room – Our suite 823 was very spacious, clean & comfortable. The only negative was the main Paparazzi Ristorante Restaurant was closed due to it being Sunday. We had to dine at the bar cocktail lounge which was extremely crowded. For an Airport Hotel restaurants should be open every day. Facilities – complimentary 24hour shuttle service to the airport. Free complimentary High Speed Internet Access in the lobby. The Club Lounge offers complimentary breakfast, & afternoon hors d’oeuvres. Outdoor heated Pool & a gym. Overall : Another comfortable short overnight stay.

Reviews.Title: “Gateway LAX is an Awesome Get Away”
Reviews.Author: iTravelview
Reviews.Content: We have been coming to this hotel for a few years to escape the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles… Yes, I live in LA but sometimes you have to down shift and just relax. This hotel property is usually our first choice given its location, special rates and the ability to use my Starwood’s reward points. The beds are oh so comfortable and the poolside Cabana’s make us feel like we are V.I.P.’s on a world tour just stopping through LA. All things said, I highly recommend the Buttermilk Calamari & Margherita Pizza in the ultra cool lobby dinning area. Delish! They recently added a wifi hub Links by Microsoft, which makes it convenient to get complimentary Wi-Fi in the lobby by the pool. Of course, I would be remiss not to mention the Starbucks lounge inside the hotel property. What else can I say? Now that you know…make it happen and visit soon.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable airport hotel but avoid the shuttle”
Reviews.Author: gkela
Reviews.Content: During a recent business trip back from SE Asia, we stayed at this hotel overnight and chose the location for its proximity to LAX. The room was average to good and the fare at the bar (we arrived too late to sample the fare at the restaurant) was also average; we were there on a Sunday night and I got the impression that the bar/restaurant was understaffed. The reviews on line touted the free shuttle to the Airport. What was not mentioned was that the shuttle stops at another hotel en route to LAX and in our case, the shuttle was, in my view, overloaded. Couple that with Summer holiday traffic and we ended up with a 20-25 minute ride to our terminal. In hindsight, we should have taken a taxi.

Reviews.Title: “I loved the service and support from the banquet staff”
Reviews.Author: Internationalevent
Reviews.Content: Estela Estrade was an associate who helped our event. She was very professional and supportive during the whole event. She went out of her way to help.

Reviews.Title: “Great Meeting Staff”
Reviews.Author: Kelli53
Reviews.Content: Zain and Estela are so attentive and extremely prepared for our group every time we book an event. They anticipate our needs and are always available when we need anything. We will continue to book meetings here in the future thanks to them!

Reviews.Title: “Arlene Smith: GIVE THIS WOMAN A RAISE!!!”
Reviews.Author: ProfessLCH
Reviews.Content: I had a wonderful experience at the Sheraton Gateway, simply WONDERFUL. My nonstop flight from the East Coast for a conference was long and quite turbulent; we could not get up the entire flight and the attendants interrupted service thrice. When I finally arrived at the hotel's front desk, I just wanted a BED and was in near tears from exhaustion. Luckily for me, Arlene Smith assisted me. I briefly told her about the flight and my immediate need for lots of water & a place to elevate my legs (my ankles were sooo swollen; we had a hearty laugh about that), especially since I had a dinner meeting with friends I hadn't seen in many years. Arlene was so SYMPATHETIC. She took one look at my attempts to be brave and upgraded me to a GORGEOUS suite. I couldn't believe it; when I walked in, I was floored. I stayed for an extra night, I loved the suite and its breathtaking views of planes landing. I also joined the Starwood Preferred Guest program, because she was so good to me. And I must say this: Although Arlene was STELLAR? Everyone I encountered helped to make me feel comfortable and welcome, including the discreet gentleman who brought my breakfast tray each morning. Why, even the shuttle drivers were delightful. The location was ideal for my conference and was very easy for my dear friends to find me. I am a neat freak (I always carry room cleaning products when I overnight) & found my suite spotless; I felt VERY comfortable in it. The free wireless Internet was fabulous, particularly because I attended a blogging conference and needed access at the conference and in my room! I am now considering a quick trip for my birthday. If it works out? I'm staying at the Sheraton Gateway. However, if that doesn't work? I shall return another day/date!

Reviews.Title: “Stephen Dycus and Customer Service Staff working evening shift 10 Aug 2011”
Reviews.Author: Samantha W
Reviews.Content: I travel to California a few times a year for business. The last night of my trips, if I am able to, I stay at this hotel, Sheraton Gateway, in Los Angeles. I have never had a problem with their services. Staff is always smiling, happy, and eager to make sure your needs and comfortably is met. This evening, 10 August 2011, I checked into the hotel after having by far one of the most stressful days in a long time. Everything that could go wrong did prior to arriving at the hotel. After I checked in, I went into my room. However, it was found that housekeeping missed the bathroom when cleaning. When I went downstairs to Customer Service, Stephen Dycus, was who addressed this issue. He apologized, I could tell that he truly meant it. He seemed to be disappointed more than I was! Stephen listened to me, while I told him about my day. He didn't appear to be ignoring me. He appeared to be listening. You can tell that Stephen puts pride, and loyalty into his work. Which is coming less to find in this day in age. Stephen went above and beyond to ensure that not only did this stay become great, but also that my day became better. After settling into my new room, I received a phone call from the front desk, it was Stephen. He was calling to see how the room was, and that he wanted to know if there was anything that I needed. I expressed my deepest appreciation Everyone at the Customer Service desk provide fantastic Customer Service. This is by far my favorite hotel. Stephen, thank you so much. This will be a day, I will always remember.

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada is AWESOME”
Reviews.Author: Sigma01
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank the Sheraton Gateway for hiring Estela Estrada, this lady is an AWWSOME asset to the banquet staff at the Sheraton. Estela was a part of the staff that assited with the Torrance 71 class reunion. She went above and beyond the call of duty when it came to service. On a scale of 1 to 10 I would give her a 20, she was polite, accomadating and showed service with a smile and pride. I loved all of the staff and will recommend catering to all my friend and party planners. The Sheraton Gateway ROCKS!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service by Stella”
Reviews.Author: luis c
Reviews.Content: Just to inform you that your employee, Stella Estrada, provided us, Class of '71 Reunion on 8-6-11, Saturday night, with excellent, kind and friendly service. She was very attentive to our group's every need. I usually don't write letters but this time I just want you to know I, we, were very pleased by her actions. Thank you very much .

Reviews.Title: “"The Service was outstanding"”
Reviews.Author: BlessnoStress
Reviews.Content: Thank You, Diane Cheek ! Great Hospitaliy. Great trouble shooter!

Reviews.Title: “Best Starwood Property at LAX”
Reviews.Author: karenash24
Reviews.Content: So we moved from the Westin LAX to this property, and couldn't have been happier with the move. On the club level, the rooms were much more updated than the Westin. The beds were comfy, had views of the airplanes, but couldn't tell you the sound ever bothered us. The club lounge was nice, typical food, nothing fantastic, but good snacks, and healthy options, always appreciated. They did offer $3 domestic beers, which was nice. The hot tub/pool were clean, oddly located behind the lobby bar, but we still enjoyed it. Self parking is a little strange. In a lot behind the property, so you have to walk 1+ block. It's not "owned" by the hotel, so you have to pay the lot directly and although you have in/out priviledges, it was a little inconvenient. Overall, a great value, and compared to the Westin LAX, a much nicer property. Seemed like it was a "happening" place, a lot of people in/out. Not in a bad way, very interesting people watching! Oh, and the airport shuttle ran consistently every 15 minutes or so

Reviews.Title: “Diane Cheek made my trip!”
Reviews.Author: DC06travels
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel! Great rooms, always clean, AWESOME GYM FACILITIES, there's a Starbucks located in the lobby,wonderful beds and a great staff to boot! My company has two hotels that we use when on business here in LA. But I always prefer this one... even though the other hotel is more centrally located. This particular trip I was travelling and on a STRICT budget so I brought food with me but I needed a refrigerator. I called down to guest services and asked if one was available. Diane answered and informed me that there was but there was a $20 charge. Normally that would have been fine, but not on this trip. When I explained my situation to Diane she did not hesitate to comp me a fridge! Wow... imagination that, someone being hospitable and generous in the Hospitality Industry!!! Thank you Diane and Thank you Sheraton Gateway for seeking out great people who care about people! Diane Cheek made my trip!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent & Friendly Service”
Reviews.Author: brwneyegr
Reviews.Content: My Mom and I came on a girls getaway to L.A. and would def stay here again! The staff was very friendly from the time we checked in to the time we left. Our room was huge, and very clean! I would recommend eating at Paparazzi, in which the pasta I had was so fresh! The menu has many options to choose from, and to top it off they had a live piano player! Right outside the hotel you can catch the Ocean Express Trolley, which you can ride for only $5 a day! It stops at three locations which took us to Mahattan Beach area, all types of shopping, and a varity of different restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Agent, Diane, is so friendly!”
Reviews.Author: sonya610
Reviews.Content: I called downstairs for some information I needed for business, she was so friendly and helpful...I think she deserves a raise! It's hard to find good customer service so when I do, I have to let everyone know! Thanks Diane!

Reviews.Title: “Best Starwood Property at LAX”
Reviews.Author: Musqat
Reviews.Content: A much better, and cheaper option than the Westin. The rooms are nicely decorated, the staff are friendly, the runway views are irresistible for any plane spotter, and the Club Lounge has good offerings. The weekend rate of about $100 with tax, is also good value.

Reviews.Title: “Gateway LAX-- close to airport and free shuttle”
Reviews.Author: kimi19
Reviews.Content: We are back from overseas and I have arranged the stay at Sheraton Gateway for a few days before we head home. I was not sure if this is a good choice for us, but after our 2nd day stay here, It IS a nice stay. a comfy bed, Starbucks in the lobby, friendly staff. Our room can see airplanes taking off and landing. We even signed up for the LA tour. They also have trolley can take you to Manhattan beach area ($5 round trip). Dianne was very nice to help us to set up internet service for free. We will stay here till the 8th. I would recommend this hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “Back to back stays, very nice for a place by the airport”
Reviews.Author: Travlholic
Reviews.Content: Spent a night at the hotel coming through LAX and then again on my return back through LAX a week later. Have to say for a large hotel that sees a lot of traffic they do a good job in having a nice and comfortable place to bed down for the night. Not my idea of staying here for a vacation for more than 1 or 2 nights, but you could given how convenient it is to everything LA. Have to say that Anka at the front desk was really impressive since I had a request for her on my way back that I really didn't think she would follow up on because how busy the the hotel is, but to my surprise when I checked in she had done what she said she would do and it worked out well for my family, so thanks Anka!! Italian restaurant downstairs was pretty good for an airport hotel and the staff was very attentive and professional even though my kids were with me. Shuttle to the hotel was fine, but we did have to wait about 20 min to catch it from the terminal. Might have just missed one since i hear they run about every 20 min. Like I said I think they do a good job and the rooms are comfortable considering how much traffic they get. I'd stay there again when I'm passing through....in fact I am in October. I hope I can report back another positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Good spot at LAX”
Reviews.Author: YTC
Reviews.Content: We have previously stayed multiple times at the Westin LAX, but couldn't get a room, so we decided to try the Sheraton Gateway. We used valet parking out front and the check-in process was quick and easy. Our room was not quite as nice as the rooms at the Westin; the bathroom needed updating and the hallways smelled of smoke (from before it was nonsmoking?) and old carpet. We had a room facing the airport, so the noise of jets landing all night was somewhat bothersome. All in all, it was a decent room. The closer proximity to the airport may be somewhat of an advantage. We would stay here again, if the Westin was not available.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for Business”
Reviews.Author: Ruselle
Reviews.Content: I stayed here while on a business trip and found the hotel to be very nice. The staff were friendly and helpful. The only downside was that the dinner menu by the bar didn't change during my stay so I basically ate the same thing every night.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect in the crazy LAX environment”
Reviews.Author: bgotis
Reviews.Content: Arriving alone late at night in LAX: all you want is a shuttle to your hotel, a friendly smile at check in and a clean room. And that's what I got! Breakfast was good. The concierge Albert was perfect: his recommandations concerning the VIP tour to LA were spot on. Airport Hotel with a smile, amazing to find it here!

Reviews.Title: “Strictly business near LAX”
Reviews.Author: JPTEncino
Reviews.Content: Although I prefer more luxurious properties I had reason to stay here and take the opportunity to review. Big, spacious lobby for meeting people, nice desk people, big pool. Very convenient to LAX, sparse room, easy in and out process for the hurried traveler. Convenient for the business traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, good service.”
Reviews.Author: MangoRacin
Reviews.Content: I'd regard this as one of the better LAX airport hotels. I was upgraded to a suite, with a spacious room, 3 lounge chairs, excellent bed and plenty of storage. Flat screen TV in room. View overlooked LAX runways. There's some mild airport noise but it didn't stop me from sleeping at all. The pool area is very nice, with good poolside service from the lobby restaurant - only catch is the pool gets in the shade for much of the day. The gym is excellent, with good equipment and space. Free airport shuttle, Starbucks in lobby (closes at 5pm though) and a good Italian restaurant. Unfortunately not much else is in walking distance to the hotel. The Westin Executive Lounge is open each evening (if you qualify) with a nice selection of tappas and beverages (alcohol at modest cost).

Reviews.Title: “Trendy bar and restaurant in Lax!”
Reviews.Author: Oreo2222
Reviews.Content: Back at the Gateway. Still the best LAX hotel in my opinion. Very nice hotel staff! Great pool. Like the new chef at the restaurant, though i definately miss some dishes! Like the bar a lot!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel met my expectations and restaurant exceeded”
Reviews.Author: austinjjc
Reviews.Content: My wife stayed here for nearly four months last year. She loved it so I had pretty high expectations. I stayed for one week this July. The hotel met those high expectations. But, I was particularly impressed with the hotel restaurant, called Paparazzi. Why? Great service. Wonderful food. The Osso Bucco was just like my Italian mother used to make. When you are on a business trip and you are tired.....this place consistently delivered.

Reviews.Title: “Best LAX Bar!”
Reviews.Author: MikeChicago76
Reviews.Content: Stayed recently for a couple of nights on a business trip. Friendly front desk, clean rooms. Nice club lounge . Definitely has the best bar in LAX. Quick service, good cocktails, very nice crowd!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant facilities, competent staff, but poor restaurants & pricey parking – Pay no more than $130”
Reviews.Author: WarmWhite
Reviews.Content: This wasn’t our first stay at the property, and we enjoyed seeing much improvement: our room was in excellent shape, the bed was comfortable and the furnishings were almost perfect. The staff was pleasant, well-trained and helpful. Upon request, they honored our Starwood status, something that apparently caused tension with another reviewer. The restaurants remain a weak point. A Starbucks outlet provides the basics, but the grandly named “Brasserie” might as well be named “Denny's”. The breakfast was comprised of standard, processed foodstuff without a hint of originality. This would certainly not pass muster in France. Given the grammatical errors in the “Italian” restaurant we didn’t even bother with it. Remarkably, despite the acres of parking lots around the property, getting a decent spot is either an expensive or a tedious task. The adjacent lot gladly took our money, but refused the promised in-and-out privileges, audaciously claiming that the “daily” rate ends at 1PM, regardless of when we entered (a few hours earlier). One must account for $30-$15 in addition to the nightly rate for parking, something that is commonly free in airport hotels. Overall, pay no more than $130 a night.

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton--a wedding party destroyed our stay!”
Reviews.Author: CherylandBrett
Reviews.Content: Had to fly out at 0655 so drove to Los Angeles after Hot Wire gave me a good price on the hotel. Never again, we'll stick with Holiday Inn! Apparently there was a wedding party on the same floor we were on and the noise was AWFUL! We finally staggered out of bed about 3am and checked out. It was quieter at the airport than at the hotel. Management was sorry and did apologize, but we will never stay there again,

Reviews.Title: “Nice good quality Sheraton, not outstanding, but nothing wrong with it either.”
Reviews.Author: FFPointsRGreat
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one short night recently (late in and early out) but everything was very good. Dinner through room service was delicious but very overpriced ($11 for a small cup of berries!). The breakfast buffet in the restaurant was excellent as well with a very large selection of items. Valet parking also seemed overpriced compared to other hotels nearby. The staff was fabulous! Very friendly and helpful staff (wanted a room overlooking the airport and was accommodated by a very helpful front desk agent). In the end was given the view I wanted and also upgrade to a very large corner suite (I'm SPG Platinum). However, the room furnishings are a little dated - the carpets need replacing and the desk chair was very uncomfortable and old (vinyl). Most hotels have ergonomic desk chairs these days but this one was far from it.

Reviews.Title: “A good LAX choice...”
Reviews.Author: a2vie
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Sheraton Gateway numerous times, when LAX was part of my plans. This time much was the same...decent room, predictable airport transfer, helpful front desk and concierge...and it's still on my airport list. Of course, it used to be better...today's Starbucks is pretty tired, Italian restaurant can't hold a candle to the old Shula Steak House...but the workout space is definitely improved. Stay away from Room 904...I had no end of internet connection problems. All in all, a dependable hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent transit hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dahee
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on arriving into LAX from Melbourne, and was a great option before I continued my domestic sector the next day. Shuttle service was easy and convenient, room was ready for me despite an 8am checkin, staff very friendly (particularly Gabrielle in the bar). Very spaciou room, clean and comfortable, great pool area. Starbucks was handy to have for a quick coffee. Overall, very good and will continue to stay there on future trips. Oh, and it's only a 25 min bus ride to Santa Monica. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Escaping Carmageddon”
Reviews.Author: smsbnyc
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the night before we had an early morning flight during the 405 nightmare. We stayed on the club floor. Arrived around 5:30 pm and went into the club room for a drink. They only had beer and wine (bad wine at that). The tables were dirty and full of old plates with chicken bones and napkins. It smelled like hot wings in there- yuck. Decided to pay for a drink that we actually wanted at the bar downstairs. Great drinks, great bartenders, fast service. We ate dinner at Paparrazi restaurant in the hotel which was just an excellent surprise! They have a new chef from Rome and the food was delicious. We brought a nice bottle of wine as they have a corkage fee. Excellent waiter. Room was nice and clean. Love the white duvet and pillows. Bathroom a little small- but we were only there one night. I would not have paid for the club floor had I known what it was like. It was not necessary and we did not use it. All in all a great stay and we will stay again! PS we need a fan to go to sleep and the concierge worked hard and got us one! Really great.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, especially for an airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: mattypw
Reviews.Content: On this trip, I stayed at the Westin LAX and Sheraton LAX and if I return I'll definitely pick the Sheraton as it has a better gym and more elegant pool area. I have to say, the Sheraton brand often irks me because I have no idea what I will find when I walk in the front door. This Sheraton, though, is newly renovated and looks great. The lobby is done in trendy greys with patches of cranberry, the bar is attractive and comfortable, and the rooms all have brand-new furniture. I had breakfast in the restaurant, which was above average. The buffet featured smoked salmon (which, in my humble opinion, is the key to taking a breakfast buffet to the next level); though the East-Coaster in me couldn't believe they didn't have bagels (what is smoked salmon without a bagel and a schmear?) Hotel gyms are important to me, and this one is large, airy, and well-equipped with dumbells, about ten weight machines, and plenty of cardio equipment. The gym looks out onto the expansive pool area. One big miss: it's a crying shame that they spent so much money on renovations but skipped updating the bathtubs. The bathtubs look worn, but I would overlook this detail and book this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “liked the hotel but wondering?”
Reviews.Author: TSwanson16
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Gateway 2 in the past couple of weeks on business trips and noticed the same two blonds hanging out in the bar and restaurant. I was wondering if they are comped by the hotel to draw male business guests? they sure work the crowd well. Not that its a bad thing, I'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “LAX HOTEL ALLSTARS”
Reviews.Author: theflyingmango
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel often. Great hotel. Front desk with service in mind regardless of the situation. When I need a late check out or have an internet charge on my bill, I dial 0 and most often get Merly on the phone. Super friendly and a quick draw when it comes to getting things done. To my surprise, the last time I called down to get an internet charge removed, she informed me (before I could get in a word) she had already removed the charges. She actively monitored and made sure I would not have the same issue again. 5 star service from the hotel staffs here. Awesome!! Thank you Jonathan, Stephen, Mustafa, Whitney, Paul, Joseph, and Merly for all the wonderful service provided. I don't know how you guys do it with the amount of traffic you guys get, but I'm very happy with every stay I've had here at the Sheraton LAX. Looking forward to my next check in. I believe this hotel is well organized and have strong leadership and staffing.

Reviews.Title: “Diane Was Great!!!”
Reviews.Author: aleeper2121
Reviews.Content: Diane helped me out with all my needs during my stay! Love the Sheraton Gateway!!! Thanks Diane!!!

Reviews.Title: “Service”
Reviews.Author: Irigoyen
Reviews.Content: Upon arriving to the hotel from an international flight, my first action was to call home to say we had arrived safely. I used the telephone in the room without realizing what the charges might be. Ignorantly, I thought they would be the same as an international call. My surprise in the morning was the bill which reflected $42 charge for 4 minutes. I gasped and called the lobby, where a wonderful lady by the name of Diane Cheek assisted me. She and another employee, Yolanda, had the charges dropped in addition to another interstate call which I had also made. I appreciate so greatly the fine service and representation that Diane Cheek and Yolanda gave for Sheraton Gateway. Two such employees should be highly commended for reflecting such a positive image of the hotel. Again, Diane Cheek and Yolanda, my gratitude for your kindness and help, and because of this, I will return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: Allegra35
Reviews.Content: While having a family reunion banquet at the hotel my family was encounter a server named Estela Estreda. She was wonderful! Estela was polite, friendly, she was in tune to what we needed before we even asked for things. Estela definiately help make our time at the hotel enjoyable. Not to mention the hotel was beautiful, had a great set up, location was excellent and the staff was GREAT!! Thank you and I will be recommending the hotel to all my friends, family and business associates.

Reviews.Title: “Don't expect anything as a Gold SPG member”
Reviews.Author: dtam
Reviews.Content: The good: Very close to LAX, free shuttle, comfy bed and quite AC system. The bad: No short term guest check-in parking, self parking is not on-site and cost $14, almost forced valet parking for $28, out dated bathroom, slow drain in shower and no club lounge access as a gold spg member. Overall a very poor experience. In the front of the hotel there are signage everywhere for valet parking ONLY. There is nowhere to stop for short term guest check-in. Self parking is in airport parking lot behind and across the street, not onsite. At check-in I asked for club lounge access and was told because they are fully booked it was being reserved for platinum SPG members only. As a gold member this was a total slap in the face. After a shower I was standing in 2" or more of water because the slow drain. I will look for other options such as the Westin the next time in LA. We also stayed at the Sheraton Mission Valley San Diego Hotel on this trip and the experience as a Gold SPG member was night and day. The Mission Valley location had a printed list of SPG gold benefit while staying at their hotel including club level room, club lounge access, late check-out, free internet, etc ... and a welcome bag with bottled water and chip. So if you book the Sheraton Gateway because of the Gold SPG benefits you might not get them. Good luck.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel close to LAX”
Reviews.Author: meadowlands1508
Reviews.Content: We booked through Hotwire for the last 2 nights of our holiday. Hotel was modern and clean. Room we had was great with a big bathroom - we were down a slightly dingy corridor but this may be because we booked with hotwire not direct and had a great rate. Staff were incredibly helpful. Parking is not cheap only onsite option is $28 per day Valet but you do get in and out. you can use an airport lot abut 5-10 mins walk away which is cheaper but don't know if it is in/out. Pool is lovely and perfect for the kids. The lobby bar was great for dinner and the kids were kept amused with the X-box kinect and Wii that were free to use. Made the last night of our holiday very nice as we could have a quiet meal. Airport shuttle is very efficient - we were warned to leave extra time. Was well connected for getting into La and there was a road with lots of shops/ places to eat about 15mins away. Would recommend this for a hotel close to LAX

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expect from a Sheraton”
Reviews.Author: Classycruse
Reviews.Content: I was very much looking forward to coming to this Sheraton and was dissapointed. The carpet was dirty. The bathroom old and narrow. There wasn't even a shower cap! The black big frame of the mirror needed to be cleaned. The restaurant was closed and Starbucks (inside the hotel) had closed at 4pm already. We had just returned from a 10days stay in a 'cheaper' hotel chain. But that hotel had offered a lot more! The only positive thing: the 24h Airport Shuttle. Overall: we would not book this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “A 3 Day Meeting made Pure Pleasure”
Reviews.Author: Zimtraveler_11
Reviews.Content: We had a 3 day program for a 1 day meeting and the hotel staff made this a great meeting. Our Client was very happy! The Banquest staffing was at our beckon call and helped us make this meeting possible especially having Estela Estrad directing her great staff. Thank you all for your hard work!!!!

Reviews.Title: “«GOOD SERVICE»”
Reviews.Author: MAILUC
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night but experienced very good and friendly service from all the staff. MERLY was just awesome. Big rooms and really nice view of the airport. Just perfect.

Reviews.Title: “BEST LAX HOTEL WITH VERY NICE ROOMS AND GREAT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: larryt43
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very close to the airport and provides free shuttle service. The Front Desk staff really make you feel welcome and the rooms are large,clean, and always have a nice robe to slip in to. The breakfast provided on the club floor is very very good and the outstanding service provided there by Miss. Heidi Shuku is deeply appreciated. She is a valuable asset for this team. Also Francisco at the front desk is outstanding and really wants to please guests. My sincere thanks to all of the team members at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best service from Estele Estrade”
Reviews.Author: abcHon
Reviews.Content: My company had a function at the Sheraton Gateway LAX ballrooms. Estele Estrade who was on the staff was super attentive and I appreciate her service. I didn't have to get up to get water or drinks and the table was cleared quickly. It's that kind of service that keeps me coming back to Sheraton Gateway LAX for meetings.

Reviews.Title: “very pleasant and refreshing will be back”
Reviews.Author: wattslife
Reviews.Content: i must say the service at the front desk was very good and refreshing ,the room i had was very comfortable and roomy and i must say the young lady that checked me in and helped me while she was on shift i felt she went above and beyond her duties to make me feel at home and i thank you and her name was Yesssenia Ponce avery beautiful and enjoyable associate.

Reviews.Title: “Our family's stay has been wonderful, the staff, rooms, and location are amazing!”
Reviews.Author: Katemariecarter
Reviews.Content: My family held our 97th family reunion at the Sheraton Gateway. As a large group checking in was a breeze, the rooms were clean, and the staff was friendly and helpful. Estele Estrada took wonderful care of us. I couldn't have asked for a better experience.

Reviews.Title: “Event was a success thanks to Zane!!”
Reviews.Author: friedmango
Reviews.Content: Hosted a very special event here recently that required months of planning on my part. Worked with Zane -----, Convention Services Manager, on several last minute changes. He assured me his staff would take care of every detail. Had questions about certain details and gave me his personal cell phone number to contact him at anytime. The day of the event concerned me because it was on Zane's day off. Once again he assured me his staff would take care of every need. The day of the event I drove up to the hotel with laundry list of things to do, and who is there to greet me? None other than Zane on his day off! From now on, Zane and the Sheraton Gateway are hosting all of my company's events.

Reviews.Title: “Very accommodating staff!”
Reviews.Author: jleft1
Reviews.Content: During our family reunion this year Ms. Estela Estrada, an employee of the Sheraton Gateway LA, was extremely helpful. She accommodated our needs and requests with care and attention to detail,and went out of her way to ensure our stay was most enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Estela Estrada Is The Best!”
Reviews.Author: mikeronaldo
Reviews.Content: I came here for my conference yesterday. This hotel was very nice and quiet. The atmosphere is wonderful and the pool is very relaxing. Estela Estrada was the one that served my break and she was very friendly and she greeted me with a welcoming smile and she knows everything. I asked her for some facts about the hotel and she will answer my questions very quickly. She knew this hotel like the palm of her hand. When the conference was finished i went to go sit down to the lobby and when she passed by through were I was sitting down and she asked us if we needed anything and I said no thanks but she insisted and brought a couple of waters for me and my friends. Thank you Estela, I rally had a wonderful conversation with you. Thanks you Sheraton for having people like her to attend your guests.! :) Thank You Estela, And always keep doing your best.

Reviews.Title: “Not good, will not stay again”
Reviews.Author: Okc2cali06
Reviews.Content: This was the first stay for us at Sheraton--not good. We were in room 1238. First thing when I check in, is I check the bathroom--the tub was filthy! It looked like feces. I immediately called the front desk and requested housekeeping, they sent maintenance to snake the tub. Really--so obviously they knew there was a problem. Once he snaked the tub then he requested housekeeping and she did a sub par job cleaning it. The room was not thoroughly cleaned as there was candy trash from the previous guest and they also left a used shower cap hanging on the lamp. That tells me the housekeeper that cleaned this room did a substandard job. I did ask the housekeeper to remove the trash and she looked at me as if to say you want me to pick this up....she did not have a good command of the English language so perhaps she could not understand. I was very disappointed that this hotel was given a 4 star as it did not meet my expectation at all. It does not have to be perfect, but I do expect clean. I will not stay again. Hate I didn't take pictures, but the maintenance guy sure did see that tub. We refused to bathe/shower in it.

Reviews.Title: “Diane Cheek was very prompt and helpful.”
Reviews.Author: Miishelshel
Reviews.Content: Check-in began with Anza who was very prompt and helpful. Then in the morning we had requested water and Diane Cheek was incredibly prompt and had water delivered within a few minutes. This is the perfect hotel stay for all of your LAX travels.

Reviews.Title: “Consistently, The Best LAX Hotel Experience”
Reviews.Author: ChiefDennis
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here for over ten years. Although the property is overdue for a facelift, the staff and service are beyond reproach. Service is friendly and consistent, and rooms always clean and refreshing. One thing lacking is their food services. Morning breakfast buffet is nice but the quality of scrambled eggs has deteriorated to unacceptable. "Paparazzi" restaurant is average at best. Kudos to Jonathan for being "everywhere" and making sure things are happening and in order. Thanks! Am looking forward to my next stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Aimbee
Reviews.Content: Each time we've stayed here the hotel staff goes out of its way to accommodate and make sure our stay is as enjoyable as possible. Everyone is professional and exhibit great customer service. On today's stay, July 6, 2011, I was especially impressed with Ms. Diane Cheek, registration desk representative, who was very welcoming, and responsive, and took great effort to ensure that all of our needs were met. The hotel itself is a very nice, clean property. I highly recommend it as you consider hotels in your travel plans. J B, Orlando, FL

Reviews.Title: “We love it and will be back for sure”
Reviews.Author: cooly57
